data.title: Henry Lewis — Sudoc
data.meta_description: Henry Lewis is a Director of Hunter Lewis, LLC, a family office that is the lead investor in SUDOC, LLC. Henry is a Founder of SUDOC, LLC, serves as an advisor to the company’s board, and leads special initiatives for the CEO.
data.text:
Henry Lewis is a Director of CA Company, a family office that is the lead investor in SUDOC, LLC. Henry is a Founder of SUDOC, LLC, and serves as both Marketing & Sales Coordinator and advisor to the company’s board.

Henry has structured and managed a number of the the Lewis family’s private investments including those in BDA Farm and SUDOC, LLC. The Lewis Family’s investment in SUDOC, LLC is based on the belief that our society will not tolerate the continued overuse of toxic chemicals that damage our health and fertility. The family believes that Sudoc is aligned to a future where people will want safe alternatives to synthetic chemicals and that Sudoc will have a profound financial and social impact.

In addition to his work at Sudoc, Henry serves as a Strategic Advisor at Bois d’Arc (BDA) Farm, a 6,000+ acre regenerative and organic farm in Uniontown, Alabama. In this capacity, he oversees farm operations as well as marketing and promotional efforts. Henry has led BDA’s development from a wholesaler into a B2C company selling beef, lamb, produce, honey, and eggs directly to consumers in Alabama and beyond.

BDA Farm was founded with a focus on three life shaping words: responsibility, service, and community. Henry has aligned the business with a belief that shared meals play a vital role in knitting together families and communities. A table full of nourishing food for family and friends to gather around is an essential piece of a life well lived. BDA recognizes a responsibility to serve its community in the Alabama Black Belt land by producing delicious, authentic, and regeneratively raised food.

Henry is active with several civic engagements. He serves on the Board of the Bhutan Foundation in Washington, D.C. and Thimphu, and as an advisor to Megavoice International.

Henry is a summa cum laude graduate of the College of William & Mary, with a BA in Religious Studies and Hispanic Studies. He is fluent in Spanish and proficient in Mandarin.
